QuestData.Title: Pirate Accuracy Increasing
QuestData.Description: Oh no, $n, the cannonballs are hitting the Speedbarge. I'd say the Southsea pirates are getting more accurate... the ship is on fire!$B$BYou've got a river boat now. Please, go speak with Griznak.$B$BExtinguish those fires!
QuestData.LogDescription: Get a River Boat from Griznak and then use the Frost Cannon to extinguish 15 fires.
QuestData.RewardText: One problem down. Now to deal with the greater threat!
